attributes.action: make the haeds of important local  bodies directly elected by individuals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Positions such as head of the local health authority, police service, education authority and similar positions which directly influence the public should be by election from the local people. If a local school is failing or hospital being closed down, the public should a get direct say as the public pay for the facility.
